item.title: DuPont Bondholders Form Majority to Reject Two Debt Swaps
item.description: Some of DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s bondholders have agreed to block part of a proposed debt exchange, complicating the chemical company’s efforts to buy back the securities after announcing a plan to sp

item.title: China Suspends Antitrust Probe Into DuPont Ahead of Trade Talks
item.description: China has suspended its antitrust investigation into the local unit of DuPont de Nemours Inc. in a potential goodwill gesture ahead of the third round of trade talks with the US next week.
